services.title: Chimney Services
services.description: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney Service is the premier chimney sweep company in Sacramento. We offer a full range of chimney services to our customers including: chimney cleanings, inspections, repairs, rebuilds, masonry work and much more! According to the National Fire Protection Agency (Source: NFPA), a yearly inspection and cleaning should be done to maintain the fireplace in your home. A popular rule is that a cleaning is needed for every cord of wood burned or at least on an annual basis.

cards.title: Inspections
cards.text: Our fully trained technicians follow the standards of the CSIA (Chimney Safety Institute of America) and NFI (National Fireplace Association).

cards.title: Cleaning
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is Sacramento's premier chimney cleaning service. With every chimney sweep, we include a full level 1 chimney inspection report. To find out more click here

cards.title: Repairs
cards.text: We bring top-notch service to your home. We are a full service chimney company in Sacramento that can handle the following repairs: crown repair, heat damage to rear firebox wall, chimney liner, refractory panels, de-glazing and more!

cards.title: Accessories
cards.text: Mike's Mobile Screen & Chimney Service offers chimney caps, fireplace grates, glass door sets, radiant fire backs and much more! Please ask our trained technicians any questions you have and they can recommend what will work best for your home.

cards.title: Masonry Services
cards.text: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney Service also offers masonry work that is not chimney or fireplace related. We are a full service masonry company in Sacramento. We specialize in the following: brick, block, stone, veneer, fireplace face/hearth, chimney stack rebuild, hardscapes, tuck-pointing, waterproofing and more!

reviews.author: Crystal C. from Citrus Heights, CA

It doesn't BANG closed like the old school security doors I've had in the past and honestly it doesn't look like a "security" door at all. I'm very comfortable leaving my door wide open and getting a breeze without worrying about randos wandering in. I'm considering ordering one of the sliding security doors for my backyard next to get a nice crossbreeze. Also, thanks to the installers for staying late and dealing with a defective lockset!

services.title: Chimney Services
services.description: At Mike's Mobile, we take pride in successfully solving your chimney needs in a cost effective and timely manner. Our goal is to make sure that your trust in us develops into a lifelong working relationship. From the office to the field, our employees have been trained by CSIA and NFI standards to give you superior customer service and high-quality workmanship. Chimney maintenance is important as chimneys vent hazardous gasses out of your home. Chimneys that are not annually swept and or inspected can potentially be a hazard to you, your family and your home. Maintaining the interior and exterior of your chimney will not only help protect you, your family and your home, but annual maintenance will aid in finding smaller problems before they develop into costly, more extensive repairs.

cards.title: Inspections
cards.text: Mike's Mobile offers level I, II, and III chimney inspections for your home. All of our technicians have been tested using CSIA and NFI guidelines for cleaning and inspecting. For more information about the levels of inspections, click here.

reviews.author: Meghan S.
reviews.review: Appointment was for chimney cleaning at 1:30 today. I will definately use them again. Daniel was great. So the company and the specific person (Daniel) get 5 stars! He was timely, called me to tell me he was on away, and professional but friendly. He answered all my questions and listened...a skill that is often lacking in people in general. I knew I would probably need to make other appointment to get my chimney caps on top done, but luckily he had 2 on his truck and we were able to kill 2 birds with 1 stone. He left no mess and did a great job at cross selling. Cross selling is a fine line to walk and I have had to do it. You want to assess whether their may be other services the person wants (like doors, screens) but you dont want to be pushy. He did a great job an mentioning things that I might be interested in which Mike's Mobile Service provides without making it a sales pitch or awkward. It takes a personalanle personality to accomplish this! Also, the ladies who answer the phones and schedule spoke with me multiple times because I rescheduled and they are great...so kudos should go their way! Thanks for your service! Meghan

reviews.review: Your staff cleaned my chimney and during the process explained what was being done. Once completed, even explained the conditions of chimney and reported no problems. Once completed, I asked if he had time to fix my Sliding Screen Door. Screen needed to be rebuilt and proper fit was awesome. Screen Door works better than the original screen. Thank you for your service and professionalism. I would be glad to recommend your company. Thanks again. Mike Faughn

reviews.author: Denise G.
reviews.review: Outstanding service. Chimney service. Inspect and clean. Chris and Anthony showed up on time. Explained the status of the chimney and recommended some services based on questions we asked. Look forward to working with them again. Very happy with their services. We highly recommend this company to anyone needing chimney inspections and service.

services.title: Security Screen Doors and Windows
services.description: Mike's Mobile has been offering premium window and door security products to Antioch for over 16 years. If you want something truly cusomizable check out our steel doors. For something contemporary that offers premium protection that doesn't have the bars of a traditional security door, check out our Viewguard. We also have aluminum and stainless mesh security products to cover your windows and back patio slider.

cards.title: Titan Security Screen Doors
cards.text: Mike's Mobile has been offering 100% customizable security doors in Antioch for over 16 years. Our doors offer premium security and the the most mounting options around. The fit and finish on these doors is unparalleled by other manufacturers.

cards.title: Viewguard Security Screen Doors
cards.text: The Viewguard is our best selling security door for a reason. The Viewguard looks like a screen door but is actually high tensile strength stainless steel woven into a fine mesh. It provides maximum security yet gives you a clear view of the outdoors without compromising the style or appearance of your home. It is a security screen door that no bars and no busy designs; it offers quiet operation and will never rust.

cards.title: TRU-View Security Screen Doors
cards.text: The Tru-View Security Screen Door has heavy gauge extruded aluminum for long lasting durabililty. Available in Bronze anodized, white or a host of custom colors, this door is sure to compliment your home. A keyed lock with inside thumb turn, steel strike plate and a deep extending dead bolt makes this lock virtually pick proof.

cards.title: Sliding Security Doors
cards.text: Enjoy the cool night air while sleeping in peace, quiet and safety. Good looks, ease of use and legitimate security really make our sliding security doors stand apart.

cards.title: Vista Quick Escape Security Window Screens
cards.text: Vista Quick Escape Security Window Screens offer the ultimate in window security with good looks to match. As an added bonus, our screens block out an average of 60% of the sun's harmful ultraviolet rays to make your home more comfortable during the summer months.

cards.title: Vista Fixed Security Window Screens
cards.text: Vista Fixed Security Screens are the perrfect solution to cover and protect non-opening windows. Our security screens can be installed on the interior or exterior and feature a hidden fastening system. With many frame options to choose from they blend in with any architecture. Applications include: Day care centers, psychiatric and detox centers, government buildings, military installations, schools, adult care facilities and residential homes.

reviews.author: Rich P.
reviews.review: Daniel and Marco did a great job installing my two front security doors and the back slider screen. They were on time, personable, and worked efficiently. They were also courteous and cleaned up after themselves. I highly recommend Mike's Mobile

reviews.author: Lindsey P.
reviews.review: I've used Mike's Mobile a few times now and they have always been great! They measured and built window screens right there at my house and most recently installed a beautiful security door. Love it!

services.title: Door and Window Screens
services.description: Most of us don’t give much thought to window screens, unless we need to use one and it is damaged or missing. When it’s time to replace your screens, you may be surprised by the many different and handy options that are currently available. Did you know that window screens can help keep out unwanted light and protect against the sun's harmful UV rays too? Solar screens can even help keep energy costs down and make your living space more comfortable. Try the shade design that rolls up like a typical window shade. Discover how Mike's Mobile can help make your home in Antioch more comfortable and efficient!

cards.title: Window Screen Repair
cards.text: With more than 16 years in service, Mike's Mobile is Antioch's premier window screen repair and replacement contractor!

He came out today on time and finished the job really fast!! I am very happy with the way it looks and I know my electricity bill will reflect it. Thank you so much Tyler and Mike's Mobile.

reviews.review: I am very happy with my new sun screens. Tyler is a true professional who took the time to explain the installation process including timeliness along with the care of the screens. Eric and his trainee (I can’t remember his name) were great at providing the estimate and recommendations based on our needs. Thank you guys!!!!

reviews.author: Thereasa G
reviews.review: My screen door is awesome and Mike's Mobile Screen & Chimney Service was incredible. They were both professional and personable and I love my door.

services.title: Chimney Services
services.description: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney Service is the premier chimney sweep company in San Jose. We offer a full range of chimney services to our customers including: chimney cleanings, inspections, repairs, rebuilds, masonry work and much more! According to the National Fire Protection Agency (Source: NFPA), a yearly inspection and cleaning should be done to maintain the fireplace in your home. A popular rule is that a cleaning is needed for every cord of wood burned or at least on an annual basis.

cards.title: Inspections
cards.text: Our fully trained technicians follow the standards of the CSIA (Chimney Safety Institute of America) and NFI (National Fireplace Association).

cards.title: Cleaning
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is San Jose's premier chimney cleaning service. With every chimney sweep, we include a full level 1 chimney inspection report. To find out more click here

cards.title: Repairs
cards.text: We bring top-notch service to your home. We are a full service chimney company in San Jose that can handle the following repairs: crown repair, heat damage to rear firebox wall, chimney liner, refractory panels, de-glazing and more!

cards.title: Accessories
cards.text: Mike's Mobile Screen & Chimney Service offers chimney caps, fireplace grates, glass door sets, radiant fire backs and much more! Please ask our trained technicians any questions you have and they can recommend what will work best for your home.

cards.title: Masonry Services
cards.text: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney Service also offers masonry work that is not chimney or fireplace related. We are a full service masonry company in San Jose. We specialize in the following: brick, block, stone, veneer, fireplace face/hearth, chimney stack rebuild, hardscapes, tuck-pointing, waterproofing and more!

cards.text: Dryer vents are a leading cause of residential fires. Clean up that honey-do list and get yours cleaned today!

reviews.review: William and Daniel were superb! Efficient, informative and impeccably professional. We had an inspection done and came out knowing a lot more about the condition of our chimney. The company also provides a report with pictures and an itemized estimate for repairs.

reviews.review: Mike mobile did an amazing job checking my chimney and providing me details on what they were going to do. Not only was he on time, but he answered all my questions. The tech gave me an overview of what will need to get done in the near future. I recommend them no doubt. Stop looking at other companies, they are the best and well profession.

Would highly recommend them to my family and friends

reviews.author: Wally W. from Oakland, CA
reviews.review: Really organized, professional, and courteous service. We had a security screen door and some custom screens installed for tricky old-school windows and both were done beautifully. Highly recommended!

reviews.author: Jane C. from Hayward, CA
reviews.review: My new security screen door was installed yesterday and I am SO PLEASED with it.   It's neat that I can see out and people outside can't see in.   Now I'll have a cooler house because I can open the front door (and the cat won't get out) and I'll feel a lot more secure.  I was a bit skeptical at first, however the company was so highly recommended I through I would give it a try.   The wait for the door was a tad long I originally thought, then I reminded myself it was a custom door, virtually hand made just for me!!     The color matched perfectly!   Customer service was top notch.  I highly recommend!!   Now for the chimney!!

reviews.author: Thomas R.
reviews.review: Mike Mobile is the best!! Quality all the way!! We called Mikes and Mike personally came out and we felt he was completely honest with us and gave us great options! No rush and no pressure. We wanted an upscale quality security door that looked good with great curb appeal!! We wanted the color of the door to match the decor of our home! We got exactly what we wanted. It took about 4 weeks to arrive but thats expected because it’s custom made!! This is a heavy duty heavy screen mesh door that makes no noise!! Lock and key installed as well. This is not a light weight clanging screen door for a couple hundred dollars and if that’s what your looking for? Then I’m certain these are not the guys you want. This is a quality made door that is quiet and constructed very well. The installation techs of Roderick and Brent were great!! They made the final cuts on site!! This door is very impressive. I am completely sold on these guys and we have additional projects we will be reaching out to Mike to help us with. We are beyond happy and 5 stars is not enough for the job from start to finish.

He suggested different ways to help me save money:  I wanted a new screen because the frame was so mangled, but he said no, let me try to repair your current screen first to save you money. His repair made the frame look better than the other ones I had on the house. He also helped me re-orientate the screws on the sliding door so it could be adjusted on the outside because the installer had installed it incorrectly. Definitely get Chris H to come to your house to do the screen. You won't regret it. In addition, the rest of Mike's Mobile team is also top notch. Check out our stainless mesh products- tru-view, viewguard, sliding security doors and Vista security window screens for premium protection without the bars!

cards.title: Titan Security Screen Doors
cards.text: Looking for a security door in the Danville or Walnut Creek area? Mike's Mobile offers the best security doors around, hands-down. Call today for a FREE quote!

cards.title: Viewguard Security Screen Doors
cards.text: The Viewguard is our top of the line security screen door. Full customizable, with many colors to choose from and a handsome frame surround, this door takes a traditional lock set to match the rest of your doors. The Viewguard door offers beauty, simplicity, and above all, absolute security.

cards.title: TRU-View Security Screen Doors
cards.text: Now you can let the cool breeze in and keep intruders out without compromising the appearance of your home. Finally, you can experience total security without resorting to bars or unsightly steel grills.

cards.title: Sliding Security Doors
cards.text: Our sliding security doors offer premium protection for your patio sliding door without any compromises. The 'screen' is actually a high strength stainless steel mesh that stops the bugs as well as the thugs so you can get the cool breeze without worry!

cards.title: Vista Quick Escape Security Window Screens
cards.text: Mike's Mobile quick escape security screens feature a high tensile strength stainless steel woven into a fine mesh. It provides maximum security yet gives you a clear view of the outdoors without compromising the style or appearance of your home.

cards.title: Vista Fixed Security Window Screens
cards.text: Mike's Mobile fixed security screens look like regular screens but offer premium security, good looks and 60% UV blockage

reviews.author: Kim S. from Walnut Creek, CA
reviews.review: Super efficient, polite and knowledgeable in their field! Brought in their own expert for our special windows, and made the screens onsite. Thanks, Daniel!

reviews.author: Jane C. from Hayward, CA
reviews.review: My new security screen door was installed yesterday and I am SO PLEASED with it. It's neat that I can see out and people outside can't see in. Now I'll have a cooler house because I can open the front door (and the cat won't get out) and I'll feel a lot more secure. I was a bit skeptical at first, however the company was so highly recommended I through I would give it a try. The wait for the door was a tad long I originally thought, then I reminded myself it was a custom door, virtually hand made just for me!! The color matched perfectly! Customer service was top notch. I highly recommend!! Now for the chimney!!

reviews.author: Wally W. from Oakland, CA
reviews.review: Really organized, professional, and courteous service. We had a security screen door and some custom screens installed for tricky old-school windows and both were done beautifully. Highly recommended!

reviews.author: J.F. from Oakland, CA
reviews.review: This company is top-notch. Tyler and Eric came out to measure to calculate a quote. They were professional and knew their products. After I received the quote, I was surprised at the cost for the Tru View front door and True-Frame sliding doors. So I drove out to the showroom in Sacramento to see the product. The doors are high quality and nice looking. Dameon and Juan installed the doors efficiently and they look perfect. Every employee I dealt with were professional and seems to like their job. I hope Mike is taking care of them because your employees take care of your customers!

Adding new window and door screens not only helps improve the look of your property, it also improves its value.

cards.text: Longing for that old-fashioned simplicity of a swinging screen door? We have many styles and colors to choose from and each of our doors are custom-sized for a perfect fit on your home.

reviews.author: Rachel K. from Fremont, CA
reviews.review: Lance and Luis were AMAZING! They attached a screen that I ordered on amazon and were SUPER professional, and easily figured it out. It really was the best service! Thank you!

reviews.author: Roger F. from Oakland, CA
reviews.review: Chris H from Mike's Mobile is now a new friend! Chris came to my home to work on a couple of screens. He introduced himself and he started working right away. It was like 105F in Pittsburg on Saturday, but he was fast and did high quality work. He suggested different ways to help me save money:  I wanted a new screen because the frame was so mangled, but he said no, let me try to repair your current screen first to save you money. His repair made the frame look better than the other ones I had on the house. He also helped me re-orientate the screws on the sliding door so it could be adjusted on the outside because the installer had installed it incorrectly. Definitely get Chris H to come to your house to do the screen. You won't regret it. In addition, the rest of Mike's Mobile team is also top notch. They responded to my request for quote even on July 4th. Who has time for customers on July 4th?  Mike's Mobile does! I couldn't be happier!

reviews.author: Sharon K. from Oakland, CA
reviews.review: I love my retractable screen door! You can barely see it, so that you can have a great unobstructed view out. It is really a great minimalist design. The workmanship was great, and because I referred another person who purchased a screen door, they threw in a free lock on the door.

reviews.author: David R. from Oakland, CA
reviews.review: A+, truly, for sliding balcony screen door re-screen & repair. There was an issue w/ the first visit but I'm still giving these guys five stars. Candy for her kindness w/ the initial scheduling of service. Apologies, but I don't remember the 2nd woman I spoke w/ who promptly scheduled a follow up visit. And Tyler, the technician who expertly resolved the issue mentioned earlier. Outstanding customer service/communication, skilled technicians, and affordable/honest pricing. Thank you.

services.title: Chimney Services
services.description: Mike's Mobile is Oakland's premier, full service chimney company. If there are issues regarding your chimney or fireplace we can also do any repairs! We can take any size job from start to finish. We are licensed, bonded and insured to provide peace of mind.

cards.title: Inspections
cards.text: Click here to learn more about the different levels of chimney inspections. The internal portion of the inspection includes a video scan of the chimney, which includes the firebox, smoke chamber, smoke shelf, chimney flue and damper assembly. Our technicians are extermely meticulous, looking for obstructions, cracks in the clay tile liner, absence of liner, signs of moisture or anything else that would make the chimney unsafe for use.

cards.title: Cleaning
cards.text: According to the NFPA, your chimney should have an annual cleaning and safety inspection. This is vital to your chimney and your home’s health. All of our technicians are certified and use the CSIA standards for chimney cleaning and inspections.

cards.title: Repairs
cards.text: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney offers chimney repairs on any scale. From minor repairs to major overhauls, you can count on us! Often times minor repairs can be done on-site after the inspection / cleaning and sometimes it requires a scheduled appointment.

cards.title: Accessories
cards.text: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney Service can take care of any custom chimney or fireplace accessories you may need. We can supply the parts and also install them for you!

cards.title: Masonry Services
cards.text: Mike's Mobile is Oakland's premier masonry contractor. We specialize in the following: brick, block, stone, veneer, fireplace face/hearth, chimney stack rebuild, hardscapes, tuck-pointing, waterproofing and more!

cards.title: Dryer Vent Cleaning
cards.text: You probably clean your dryer’s lint trap, but did you know lint and other debris get past that screen and clogs the dryer vent itself? Clogged dryer vents can cause many issues including fire, carbon monoxide accumulation, extra wear to clothing, excessive energy use, and mold growth.

reviews.author: Michael T. from Walnut Creek, CA
reviews.review: Today I had my dryer vent cleaned out for the first time in years! Mike's came out to do the service, and did one hell of a job ! While here I had them measure and quote on two of their beautiful screen doors..and a remote awning for the sun side of the house..over the sliding door. With that...They will be returning on Friday..to sweep and inspect the chimney...I had a recent complaint from Santa!

reviews.author: Proberta G. from San Francisco, CA
reviews.review: Outstanding customer service. They scheduled a service even though it was short notice, they showed up on time, the protected the area around the fireplace and left absolutely no mess behind. They were extremely courteous and knowledgeable, and the price for a chimney cleaning and inspection was very reasonable. Highly recommend.

reviews.author: Daniel B. from Oakland, CA
reviews.review: Prompt and very efficient. Tim was very friendly. I had needed a dead squirrel pulled out of my chimney and a new screen put on the top of the chimney.

reviews.author: J.T. from Oakland, CA
reviews.review: If you're looking for someone to assess and clean out your chimney, look no further! Mike's Mobile Screen and Chimney Service was quick to respond to my inquiries ( we have a Sweedish fireplace, not your typical layout) and they were the most reasonably priced for the service provided (which included a free level 1 inspection). During the booking process, Mike's Mobile Screen and Chimney Service was on top of communication and on the day of service, Ryan kindly called me to let me know he was running late. Ryan was quick and efficient, he got the job done not leaving a trace of dirt in my place! I highly recommend this service, you won't regret it and you'll get every penny's worth.

reviews.author: Jason A. from Oakland, CA
reviews.review: Mike and team responded quickly via Yelp for a price quote and to schedule and appointment. His guys showed up early and were diligent in their work cleaning my old chimney. Would definitely use them again.

Mike's Mobile's cleaning services not only protect you from hazards such as fire and carbon monoxide buildup, but also provide many added benefits such as energy savings, shorter drying cycles and less damage to clothing.

reviews.author: Dennis H. from Gustine, CA
reviews.review: Very professional, they did the work first time and on time. Our tech Chris completed a minor repair inspected and completed his work in clean and professional manor. I would highly recommend Chris for retention and promotion and highly recommend Mikes Mobile should you need your chimney cleaned.

reviews.author: Michelle V.
reviews.review: I was very impressed with Damian, of Mike's Mobile Screen and Chimney Service (I had their chimney sweep service). Damian was very polite and conscientious of my floors and furniture (he wore shoe coverings and used tarps around the fireplace). Damian explained the cleaning and inspection process prior to starting his work, and then he followed up with an email explaining the results of the inspection (the report included pictures). Damian found one needed repair, but was in no way pushy to have his company complete that repair. He simply provided me with an estimate should I decide to have Mike's Mobile do the repair. The price of the chimney sweep service seemed about average, and I was able to schedule an appointment with Mike's Mobile much sooner than I could with other Chimney Sweeps in the area. I would highly recommend Mikes Mobile Screen and Chimney Service.

reviews.author: Laura W.
reviews.review: Very happy that I chose Mike's Mobile Screen & Chimney Service to clean my chimney. Ryan, the technician, was professional and friendly, thorough, and very helpful with advice for smart wood burning. He even provided me a brochure about safe burning in my wood stove. Thanks so much! I highly recommend using Mike's Mobile Screen & Chimney Service!

reviews.author: Genevieve O.
reviews.review: Daniel came to our house today to inspect and clean our chimney and it was a great experience. He was professional and thorough and explained everything that we need to keep our fireplace in top shape. I will definitely be using Mike's Mobile Screen & Chimney in the future and highly recommend!”

cards.text: Want something truly custom and unique for your home? Mike's Mobile security doors are auto-cad designed for tight tolerances but are ultimately hand-made which means a 100% customizable door with a fit and finish that exceeds any other security door.

cards.text: Now you can let the cool breeze in and keep intruders out without compromising the appearance of your home. Strength and beauty in perfect harmony.

cards.text: The Tru-View looks like a screen door but is actually high tensile strength stainless steel woven into a fine mesh. It provides securitybut gives you a clear view of the outdoors without compromising the style or appearance of your home. A security screen door that no bars and no busy designs, a simple looking outer frame with a specialized stainless steel mesh!

cards.title: Sliding Security Doors
cards.text: Ever wanted to sleep with your patio door open so you can get the breeze and fresh air all night? Now you can with our sliding security doors. The stainless steel mesh looks like a screen but offers premium security with maximum airflow and also cuts UV rays by 60%.

cards.title: Vista Quick Escape Security Window Screens
cards.text: Want security but the jail-bar look isn't for you or your home? Mike's Mobile has you covered! Our security screens come in a variety of frame colors and the 'screen' is actually a high-tensile strength stainless steel weave. It offers great looks, superior protection and even blocks 60% of the sun's UV rays for those hot summers.

cards.title: Vista Fixed Security Window Screens
cards.text: Say no to the old school jail-bar iron bars over windows for security. The Vista fixed security screens offer better looks, better security and will never rust. On top of all that he stainless mesh cuts out 60% of UV rays to help your home stay cool for those hot Modesto summers.

reviews.author: Lisa S. from Manteca, CA
reviews.review: Our 2nd experience with Mike's Mobile today. Several months ago they installed a security screen door for us. It's been such a terrific addition to our home. Today, they installed a security sliding screen door after our puppy had pretty much destroyed the existing screen. The stainless steel mesh is definitely puppy proof! Thank you to Daniel and Jacob for being on time, friendly, professional, quick workers, and thorough. They even moved patio furniture out of the way and then back in place for me. Great job, quality materials and work, and a fair price. Don't hesitate to use them!

reviews.author: Joyce W. from Stockton, CA
reviews.review: Excellent job from a Mikes Mobile. Daniel installed a security sliding screen door. He arrived on time, made sure everything worked and cleaned up. Thank you Daniel. I would highly recommend Mikes mobile screen.

reviews.author: Sally S. from Lodi, CA
reviews.review: I had a custom security screen door made for my over-sized front door and 3 security sliders for my patio doors, and could not be happier! Their customer service was excellent from the beginning clear through to the end. Daniel and Estafan (sorry if I spelled wrong)  called when they were on their way, and arrived on time. They had some challenges with my front door, but were persistent and professional about it till they got it done. They also put 3 sliding security screen doors on my patios. I am extremely happy with the work that they did. They were super friendly and cleaned up everything before leaving. I would certainly recommend Mikes' Mobile to any one needing any of their services. I know I will call them in the future for any of my needs.

reviews.author: Linda I.
reviews.review: What a pleasure it was dealing with the employees at Mike's Mobile Screens. They were on time, knowledgeable, courteous, and passionate about our project. In a time when customer service is to say the least lacking. It was a pleasant surprise to deal with a company who made my opinion a priority! I sincerely encourage anyone to call Mike's Mobile Screens👍

reviews.author: Gabriel O. from Vacaville, CA
reviews.review: 5 Stars for Amber! I got my chimney cleaned and was very happy with the professional service she provided. She arrived on time, always a plus, and explained the cleaning process inside and on the roof and answered all of my questions. The area inside was kept clean throughout the entire process. She reviewed a detailed report with pictures at the end of the service and repair recommendations without being pushy. I won't hesitate to have Mike's clean my chimney in the future.

reviews.author: Ray A.
reviews.review: I highly recommend Mike's Mobile Screen & Chimney service if you're looking to have your chimney cleaned anytime soon. I called to make an appointment and they were able to come out in a couple of weeks after calling. They were booked up for prior dates, so that's a good sign of a company in my opinion. The technician, Daniel, arrived at 8:00 AM sharp! He greeted me with his name and a good handshake. He was very professional, explained what he was doing and was very clean and meticulous. The whole job took him approximately an hour and half to complete. I will definitely utilize Mike's Mobile Screen & Chimney services in the future.

reviews.review: I highly recommend Matt from Mike's Mobile for chimney & fireplace cleaning. Matt arrived promptly and did an excellent job cleaning my gas fireplace & left NO mess. I will definitely recommend them to my family & friends!

reviews.review: Mike's Mobile saved the day! We were selling our home and the buyer's chimney inspector gave us a soot-smudged hand-written report that had over $10,000 of repairs needed to our chimney. The explanation for the repairs was confusing and no one really understood what was going on. On top of that, I thought it was a little bit funny since our home inspector hadn't found anything wrong. I called Mike's Mobile for a second opinion and they were able to come out the next day (we were in a time crunch for escrow) and gave us a digital report with pictures and detailed explanation of everything on the spot!! Wow! The technician answered all of our questions in great detail and backed everything up with pictures on the report. I felt bad for the other realtor for recommending that other company but I'm happy we got a fair and honest report in the end.

reviews.review: CALL MIKES MOBILE! We heard a noise in our backyard a couple of months ago and ended up finding boot prints and a bent screen in our yard the next day. Someone had hopped our fence and was in our yard!!! I haven’t been comfortable being home by myself since. After a little bit of waiting Mikes mobile was able to come out and install 4 security window screens, a security door over our patio slider and a front security door. I thought we were going to have to get bars but these are SO much better. They are not cheap but worth every penny. They look so much better than bars would have! Thanks Mikes Mobile for helping me sleep again!!

reviews.author: Carlos Vega
reviews.review: They seemed a bit pricey at first but after a thorough comparison they were actually a pretty good deal. My wife and I were struggling with the idea of getting a security door but didn’t want one that would rust. I wasted a few months getting a quote from a big box store (I won’t name) only for them to tell me they couldn’t mount the door on the trim I had. That whole ordeal was just a giant headache. I saw Mike’s Mobile from a facebook post. They had a better door and were super knowledgeable about mounting options. With everything factored in: custom measuring appointment, a better quality door, some tweaks (extending our threshold for no gap) and most importantly, professional installation, I think we ended up saving money with Mike’s Mobile. The technician even answered some questions about my chimney after he installed the door. I’ll be calling them back for chimney cleaning in a few months!
